author: Stephanie Bedard-Chateauneuf
title: Coronavirus Will Change Consumer Shopping Habits Permanently
description: The coronavirus pandemic could leave a lasting mark on consumers as social distancing becomes the norm long after the crisis passes. The post Coronavirus Will Change Consumer Shopping Habits Permanently appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Consumers dont shop the same way as they use to since the start of the coronavirus pandemic.
  • Online shopping has surged the past few weeks.
  • Consumers will likely keep shopping online after the pandemic, so retailers must be ready.
